root.name: Age of Pirates: Captain Blood
root.description: Based on the novels by Rafael Sabatini which focus on the pirate Captain Blood, this long-in-development game is most likely released before the end of 2010. It'll follow the adventures of the captain in Spanish Main in the year 1685.Â It has been in development for years, and was originally set to be released on the Xbox in 2006.

similar_games.game: Pirates of the Caribbean: Armada of the Damned
